recipes.title: Sugared Pecans Gift Idea & Silhouette America Promotion
recipes.summary: You can never have too many side dish recipes, so give Sugared Pecans Gift Idea & Silhouette America Promotion a try. For $2.43 per serving, this recipe covers 15% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. One serving contains 655 calories, 7g of protein, and 54g of fat. Many people made this recipe, and 419 would say it hit the spot. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 1 hour and 5 minutes. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free, dairy free, fodmap friendly, and vegetarian diet. Head to the store and pick up egg white, ground cinnamon, salt, and a few other things to make it today. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 76%. This score is good. Try Homemade Hot Cocoa Mix Gift Packaging Idea, Jalapeno Pepper Jelly ~ Edible Gift Idea #1, and 5 Reasons Why Homemade Taco Seasoning is a Terrific Last Minute Gift Idea for similar recipes.
recipes.instructions: Heat your oven up to 250 degrees.In a small bowl add the egg white and water and whisk until frothy.Pour in pecans and stir to coat them all evenly.In a separate bowl add sugar, cinnamon, and salt. Mix well.Pour sugar mixture into pecan mixture and mix well until pecans are coated.Place on a non stick sheet or prepare a cookie sheet and then spread out the pecans evenly.Place in the oven for 1 hour, turning the pecans every 15 minutes.

steps.step: Heat your oven up to 250 degrees.In a small bowl add the egg white and water and whisk until frothy.
Pour in pecans and stir to coat them all evenly.In a separate bowl add sugar, cinnamon, and salt.
Mix well.
Pour sugar mixture into pecan mixture and mix well until pecans are coated.
Place on a non stick sheet or prepare a cookie sheet and then spread out the pecans evenly.
Place in the oven for 1 hour, turning the pecans every 15 minutes.

recipes.title: Favorite Moist Chocolate Cake
recipes.summary: For $1.02 per serving, this recipe covers 11% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. One serving contains 387 calories, 7g of protein, and 23g of fat. Head to the store and pick up coffee, cream cheese, baking soda, and a few other things to make it today. This recipe is liked by 146 foodies and cooks. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 46%. This score is good. Try Moist Chocolate Cake, Moist Chocolate Cake, and Moist Chocolate Cake for similar recipes.
recipes.instructions:
1. To Make Cake:
  2. Sift together dry ingredients. Add oil, coffee and milk. Whisk until combined. Add eggs and vanilla. Whisk until well incorperated (about 2 min.). It will be quite runny.
  3. Grease and flour 2- 9 inch round pans. Pour the batter into the pans and bake at 325F for 25-30 min until a toothpick inserted into the centre comes out clean.
  4. Let the cakes cool in the pans for 10 min. before removing to cool completely.
  5. To Make Strawberry Mousse:
  6. Mix together the cream cheese and sugar until completely smooth. Mix in the pureed strawberries.
  7. Whip the cream to stiff peaks and fold into the strawberry cream cheese mixture.
  8. Line a 9 inch round pan (the same size you used for the cakes) with plastic wrap and pour the mousse inside. Freeze until solid.
  9. To Make Ganache:
  10. Bring cream to a boil over medium heat.
  11. Poor over chocolate. Let sit for a moment then stir until smooth.
  12. Let cool to room temp.
  13. To Assemble:
  14. Remove mousse from freezer and unwrap.
  15. Place one cake layer on serving platter. Position frozen mousse in the centre and top with remaining cake layer.
  16. Allow to thaw for 30 min, or so.
  17. Meanwhile drizzle with ganache and garnish with fresh strawberries.

steps.step: To Make Cake:Sift together dry ingredients.
Add oil, coffee and milk.
Whisk until combined.
Add eggs and vanilla.
Whisk until well incorperated (about 2 min.). It will be quite runny.Grease and flour 2- 9 inch round pans.
Pour the batter into the pans and bake at 325F for 25-30 min until a toothpick inserted into the centre comes out clean.

recipes.title: Banana- Honey Chocolate Chip Bread
recipes.summary: Banana- Honey Chocolate Chip Bread might be just the bread you are searching for. This recipe serves 1 and costs $14.92 per serving. One serving contains 6995 calories, 114g of protein, and 256g of fat. This recipe is liked by 6 foodies and cooks. If you have flour, baking soda, sugar, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 88%. This score is spectacular. Try Honey Whole Wheat Chocolate Chip Banana Bread, Chocolate Chip Banana Bread Plus Sweet Banana Roundup, and Honey- Sweetened Low Fat Banana Chocolate Chip Muffins for similar recipes.
recipes.instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 325*. Butter a loaf pan with a small amount of melted butter and lightly dust with flour. Using the bowl of a Kitchen Aid mixer beat the eggs with the sugar on medium high until thick and light, about 5 minutes. Add mashed bananas, buttermilk, honey, oil, vanilla, walnuts, remaining butter and chips. Mix.
  2. Mix together flours, baking powder, soda and salt. Add dry mixture to wet ingredients and beat until just combined. Transfer batter to loaf pan and bake about 1 hour. Bread is done when a tester inserted in the center comes out clean. Let bread sit for about 10 minutes; then turn bread out on a rack to finish cooling.

steps.step: Preheat oven to 325*.  Butter a loaf pan with a small amount of melted butter and lightly dust with flour.  Using the bowl of a Kitchen Aid mixer beat the eggs with the sugar on medium high until thick and light, about 5 minutes.
Add mashed bananas, buttermilk, honey, oil, vanilla, walnuts, remaining butter and chips.
Mix.
Mix together flours, baking powder, soda and salt.
Add dry mixture to wet ingredients and beat until just combined.
Transfer batter to loaf pan and bake about 1 hour.  Bread is done when a tester inserted in the center comes out clean.
Let bread sit for about 10 minutes; then turn bread out on a rack to finish cooling.
